Author: sstephenn
Text: I hate loose fitted pants, but I wear oversized sweatshirts and jackets. I hate buying clothes too especially when I started gaining weight and my underwear didn’t fit anymore AHHHHHH I’m sort of ok with the clothes I have now but I’m never satisfied. sigh

Author: dinerdrive
Text: Clothes can be a real hassle. Maybe try those like jogger/sweatpant-type things? (the pants that are basically sweatpants but slightly less shapeless??) They won't hug your body and they don't feel fitted, but they are less frumpy-looking than sweatpants
